item.title: FTC says it will appeal Meta antitrust decision
item.description: The Federal Trade Commission said Tuesday it will appeal the November ruling in favor of Meta in its antitrust case against the social media giant

item.title: Power cut caused by technical fault affects the Danish Baltic Sea island of Bornholm
item.description: Authorities say electricity to the Danish island of Bornholm was cut off due to a technical fault that caused an undersea cable to be disconnected
